messages.title: Standing up for our NHS and Carers
messages.content: We know they need additional investment urgently - Gideon wants to halt NHS privatisation in Somerset and is campaigning for a penny on income tax to provide the funding. Only the Liberal Democrats have a costed plan of this kind.

messages.title: Fighting for all Residents
messages.content: Whether you work in a business or in the public sector our local Liberal tradition means you should be able to lead your life your way. Every day our public, emergency and armed services make that possible and deserve respect - not just more cuts.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Taunton Deane schools face big cuts this year from a Conservative Government that has stopped listening to local people and caused stress to children and parents. We need a passionate and authoritative voice to stand up to the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Standing up for our NHS and Carers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Gideon wants to halt NHS privatisation in Somerset and is campaigning for a penny on income tax to provide the funding.
Ensuring respect and support for people working in business and public sectors through our Liberal tradition.
Addressing the significant cuts faced by Taunton Deane schools and standing up to the Conservatives.
